121.content:
It had been a long day for Judy Hopps. It had been a patrol day, and a busy one too. Anti-prey graffiti to catalogue, several perps who insulted her size and species, and to cap it all off near the end of the day she was almost killed by a wolf fleeing a scene. She’d been weaponless, but even with all her combat training, Judy had slipped, and if it hadn’t been for Nick stepping in at the last minute, she probably would have been gravely injured, at the very least.

That was the specific reason why she was in the living room, looking out a window into the starry sky, while Nick was in their shared bedroom, alone. Her relationship with Nick Wilde has been going really well, or at least Judy thought so. But after Nick had needed to run in to save her, he’d been furious with her the second they’d gone home. ‘What were you thinking! Going after someone four times your size without back-up? You can’t do everything yourself, Hopps!’ Those had been the words he’d thrown in her face, before stomping off to be by himself.

Everything that day had reminded her, again and again and again, how much being a prey animal, specifically a very small prey animal at that, gave her such a huge disadvantage. In her job, and just in life. She’d spent her entire life training to overcome those weaknesses, but sometimes she still didn’t feel like she was enough. A shooting star flew through the night sky, and Judy couldn’t help making a childish wish. “I wish...I was born the kind of animal who doesn’t have days like today.”
121.title: When You Wish Upon a Star

That seemingly settled, Bogo looked at some papers on his desk and, without looking at either of them, said, "Wilde, you're off the drug case." Before Nick could object, Bogo continued, trampling over the objection. "There's a fraud investigation in Savanna Central that could use your expertise. In the meantime, Hopps, you're getting partnered with Hornsburl." Both cops made noises of unhappiness about this, but Bogo raised a palm to quiet them. "It's just until the case is over. Now, get out of my office and get to work."

They walked out together, Nick chattering away about how ridiculous this was after leaving Bogo's earshot, but Judy was lost in her own thoughts. She vaguely knew Hornsburl, a big, tough rhino guy who worked in Narcotics. He'd never had much to say to her before, but he'd also been so intimidatingly large there had never been anything Judy had wanted to say to him. Nick and Judy reached the point where they'd need to part ways for the separate parts of the building, and Judy leaned down to kiss the top of his head, something he had before often had to do to him, leaving Nick running off with a blush on his face.

When she found Hornsburl, he was in the break room, making himself some coffee. Unlike what she'd had at home, the mug he was using was large enough to make drinking it worthwhile. It was right after that, that she started to feel strange.

It was only later that same evening, after she had gone home to her Apartment, that she discovered that the rock was now in her pocket. She was currently sitting on her bed, still in her ZPD uniform, and holding the rock in one of her paws, wondering if perhaps it was magical, after all.

Suddenly, the strange feeling intensified. Judy wasn't sure what to expect, but what happened definitly wasn't it!

Which part of her soon-to-be chimera-mammal body, does Judy's current bunny-body get first?
145332221112.title: Judy is not feeling well...

15231111.content:
In a shady part of downtown Zootopia exists a small store named "The Antiques Nook" run by an old tanuki named Yua Aisareru. Her shop was something of a specialist dealer selling all kinds of classic items plus many that some would call mystical. Today was a slow evening and she was just getting ready to close when she heard the bell from the door. She looked up from her magazine to see a fox in a green Hawaiian shirt and khaki pants walking in. This was Nick Wilde.
"Hello, welcome to my store?" Yua said. "Is there something I could help you with?"
The fox gulped. He had been thinking about coming here for weeks before he worked up the courage.
"Um, yes," Nick said. "I hear you offer items that can help people, um, change."
"Well, somewhat," Yua said. "What king of "change" are you looking for?"
Nick's nervousness continued. He'd heard of this place and believed it was likely the only place that could give him what he was looking for, however unlikely it sounded.
"Well, I want to, err, change my species," Nick said. "Not permanently, just maybe for a night or two."
"Huh, that's an odd request," Yua replied.
She picking up on the fox's tentative attitude. She smiled, this was going to be fun.
"But it is something I may be able to help you with," Yua said. "What are you looking to become? Something tougher like a wolf or a tiger? Something less conspicuous like a ram or a mouse? Something with more endurance like a horse?"
"I want to be a bunny," Nick replied.
"A rabbit?" Yua asked inquisitively. "An unusual choice, especially for a fox. You trying to multiply or something?"
"My girlfriend is a rabbit," Nick replied. "I know we get funny looks whenever we are out in public and there are always some things I can't do for her or that we must plan to accommodate because of my species. If just for one night I want to give her a special night out without any of the interspecies stigma."
"Your reasoning is sound," Yua said. "I was thinking you wanted to do it as part of a disguise or a scam."
Nick rolled his eyes, old stereotypes die hard. His attention turned back to the task at hand.
"Can you do it?" Nick asked.
"Yes, I believe I can," Yua responded. "I may have an item here under my desk that may be able to help you."
Yua reached down under the table. She found what she was looking for. It was ...
15231111.title: Nick does it for Judy

1523122.title: Other

152322.title: How?

choices: He starts changing then and there.
He goes home and falls asleep, and wakes up changed.
1523221.content:
Nick was on the way home from a night out with a few friends, slightly tipsy and excited to see his girlfriend, Judy Hopps, tomorrow. "Hey," came a whisper from a nearby alley. Even inebriated, that caught Nick's attention. He turned around, nocturnal eyes piercing through the dark of the night, and he saw a fellow fox with black fur come up to him, his eyes bright and his pockets full. "Ya lookin for anything, friend?"

It was a struggle not to break out into laughter at this. Nick was an officer for the ZPD. He should probably bust this guy right now. Though, he thought, maybe he should check out what he's packing first. "What do you have, my friend?" Nick asked, purposely making himself sound drunker than he actually was.

The black fox smiled. "Do you got a lady friend?" Nick nodded. "Good. Well, I just got my hands on some of this..." from one of his many pockets the fox pulled out a perfume spray bottle, filled with some clear liquid. "Just got it from a friend of mine, who says his friend got a box of this stuff off a truck. Smell's real good, sure your vixen will love it."

Deciding not to correct the fox, Nick looked the bottle over and smiled. "How much?" The fox raised five fingers. That was a deal. Nick handed him a five, took the bottle, and went on his way home. Before he had quite reached it, however, Nick realized he hadn't actually tested out the perfume. How did he know it would smell good? And so Nick raised it up to his face and let out a small spray. It took all of his willpower not to gag. This stuff smelled terrible. Nick threw the bottle into an alleyway, frowning. What a waste of money.
1523221.title: Shouldn't have bought that gift

info.brief_description: Transform the fuzzy mammals from Zootopia into whatever species you want!
info.description:
Here is a place where we can transform the mammals of Zootopia from once species to any other! You can do this through magic, science, whatever! There are a few rules:

1) Please post with good spelling/grammar. Offending posts will be removed.
2) Keep Feral stuff in the appropriate side area, which I will create early on. Feral stuff outside that will be removed.
3) TG is welcome! AR, AP, WG, GTS, Shrinking, and Hermapthrodites are all allowed as well, though AR is not allowed to go beyond legal age.
4) Age play, fecal, inflation, inanimate, urine, and unbirthing are not allowed. Sorry, you guys, but there are interactives for that.
5) Really good posts that the creator likes will earn the poster 500GP or more!

Have fun!
